alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued February 15 at 2:21PM PST until February 15 at 2:45PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM PST FOR SOUTHEASTERN INYO COUNTY... At 219 PM PST, a wall of dust was located near Badwater Basin, moving southeast at 15 mph. This haboob has been confirmed by the public. HAZARD...Less than one quarter mile with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This will impact Badwater road and Highway 190 through Death Valley will be impacted. Locations impacted include... Shoshone, Furnace Creek, Tecopa, Death Valley Junction and Texas Springs Campground. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
